snippet: The remodeled First World War galleries at the Imperial War Museum in London prefer to convey the experience of the conflict rather than explain the forces behind it.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews Imperial War Museum in London; holds that remodeled First World War galleries prefer to convey experience of the conflict rather than explain the forces behind it.
lead_paragraph: The remodeled First World War galleries at the Imperial War Museum in London prefer to convey the experience of the conflict rather than explain the forces behind it.

headline.seo: First World War Galleries Reopen at Imperial War Museum
headline.main: Revisiting the Nightmares of World War I
headline.print_headline: Revisiting the Nightmares of World War I
